this_title: Chez les derniers canuts de Lyon
introduction: 纪录短片关于里昂最传统的手工行业 - 纺丝。A fine documentary of silk weaving in Lyons, France.Jean Michaud also known as Jean Mailland (born the April 26th 1937 with Aix-the-Baths, Savoy) is a writer, Parolier, Acteur and Réalisateur for the Cinéma and the Télévision. Jean Mailland follows the courses of the dramatic academy of Lyon, then the school of the Theater of the Comedy of Roger Planchon also in Lyon. He goes up then to Paris where he follows the course Henri Bose. He is in continuation in turn director, first assistant (between-others of Claude Barma, of André Michel, Jean-Jacques Vierne, and Pierre Laryau), scenario writer (of Hellé carried out by Roger Vadim), technical adviser on Bako of Jacques Champreux.
foreign_title: Chez les derniers canuts de Lyon
